title: Drillia oliverai
data: Drillia oliverai is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Drilliidae.[1] The length of the shell of this marine species varies between 25 mm and 38 mm. This species occurs off Cebu Island, the Philippines. This Drilliidae-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
